attributes.action: Make travel to and from work by public transport or by cycling tax deductible.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe this would help us to become a greener society.take cars off the road during rush hours and help providers of public transport to survive in more rural areas. It will also help with people’s fitness, as they will walk or cycle to transport hubs & it will ease parking in towns & cities.
People should be rewarded for making the effort to use public transport or cycling  to & from work.
attributes.background: I believe this would help us to become a greener society.
